ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207:2017(E) A key characteristic of SoS is emergence — the unanticipated effects at the SoS level attributed to the complex interaction dynamics of the constituent systems. However, in SoS, constituent systems are intentionally considered in their combination, so as to obtain and analyze outcomes not possible to obtain with the systems alone.
